LANDING.TITLE: Welcome to the Talent Catalog
LANDING.INTRO: Landing page - the what and the why
LANDING.PARA1: Welcome to the Talent Catalog! This site is an online platform designed to capture the skills and talents of refugees and other displaced people.  Registration in the Talent Catalog is free of charge. This site is available in both Arabic and English.
LANDING.PARA2: Talent Beyond Boundariesâ€™ mission is to open pathways for refugees and other forcibly displaced people to use their skills and talents as a route towards restored self-reliance and safety. Talent Beyond Boundaries is a nonprofit organization. We link those who are displaced by conflict with jobs in countries around the world where their skills are needed. At this time, TBB has operations in Jordan, Lebanon, Australia, Canada, and the UK. Learn more about Talent Beyond Boundaries at talentbeyondboundaries.org.

DRAFT.EXPLANATION: You haven't finished your registration. Please click the button below to continue.

PENDING.EXPLANATION:
Thank you for completing your profile on the Talent Catalog! TBB will only contact you if an employer expresses interest in your profile. 


You can update your profile with additional information at any time. We recommend you continuously update your profile with any new information relevant to your professional experience or qualifications, as well as update any changes in your contact information.

INCOMPLETE.EXPLANATION: You have not finished your Talent Catalog profile. Your profile cannot currently be considered for international employment opportunities. Please look back through your profile and add additional information. Remember to 'submit' your profile at the end.

TITLE.EXPERIENCE: Tell us about your working history
TITLE.CERTIFICATIONS: Do you have any other professional certifications?
TITLE.SUBMIT: Are you ready to submit your application?

LANDING.TITLE: Let's get started
LANDING.PARA1: In order to be considered for international employment opportunities, you can create a profile on the Talent Catalog. We encourage you to share as much detail as possible about your work experience when creating your profile. Please note that your registration is not complete until you click 'Submit' at the end of the process. It may take between 15 min - 1 hour to complete a full profile.
LANDING.PARA2: Talent Beyond Boundaries will use the information you share to identify relevant international employment opportunities, and may share your skills profile with interested employers. TBB will not share your identifying details with any other parties without your consent. TBB does publicly share anonymized, aggregate data about all registrants in the Talent Catalog.
